
                            
                            <p>活动对象 <br> 广东地区（不含广州、深圳，下同）工银xing/用卡持卡人 <br> *新办卡客户在成功开户后T 3日可参加活动 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/01/081732w6mh2iqfy6wfgocc.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/01/081732w6mh2iqfy6wfgocc.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
